name: A Calm Night
description:
Sal is spending his night with his close friend, Yumi, and there's a lot on his mind. Will he be able to say what he's thinking before he runs out of time?

Team Lead, Programmer: Splash Ink

Writer, Voice Actor: Jelli (IG)

Character Sprite Artist: Darty (IG)

Background/Menu Artist: Parker (IG) (Tumblr) (Twitter)

Music: Musical Enjoyment (YouTube)
